author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes legacy modules from the ECAL Phase 2 development workflows and updates the validation to work without endcaps and preshower collections. The workflows also use the proper Phase 2 pulse shape obtained from 2018 TB data.
The `EcalLazyClusterTools` were updated to make an EE input collection optional.
ECAL DQM tasks and clients not needed for Phase 2 are removed from the workflow. This is not the final setup. Some tasks may be added or modified at a later time when the required inputs become available.

No changes are expected for Run 3 workflows. Phase 2 workflows could have several endcap and preshower DQM and validation plots removed but the barrel ones should not be affected.

#### PR validation:

Passes limited matrix tests (except some file open errors) as well as WFs 34034.0 and ECAL Phase 2 development workflows 34034.61 and 34034.612.
title: ECAL Phase 2 - Upgrades for Phase 2 development workflow, validation and DQM
